page.name: Orion's Universal Belt
page.description: This belt does not seem like the others. It has a strange hollow orb attached. When you look inside you can see what looks like a universe! Is that? No, it cannot be. Drakath does not have wings. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Heart Scale
